about: Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience building and scaling distributed systems, cloud platforms, and large-scale service-oriented architectures. At Klarna, I'm part of a team designing and operating bank-grade cloud deployment platforms that power mission-critical financial services for over 150 engineering teams. We manage centralized AWS infrastructure supporting hundreds of microservices and thousands of ECS tasks across all environments.

Expert in Java and modern programming languages (Go, TypeScript, Python, C#, Perl) with extensive experience in system architecture design, data flow implementation, and business process automation. Strong background in cloud-native technologies including AWS (ECS, Lambda, Step Functions, EC2, RDS, VPC, Route53, S3, SQS, DynamoDB, ASG, CDK, CloudFormation), Kubernetes (OpenShift, ArgoCD with operator development experience), Docker, and infrastructure automation (Terraform, Ansible). Extensive experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, DB2, DynamoDB, Solr) and message queues (ActiveMQ, SQS). Full-stack development experience including TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Vue.js.

Proven track record in designing and implementing automated workflows, system integrations, and data flows for complex distributed systems. Successfully architected and maintained large-scale R&D and production infrastructure, both on-premise and cloud-based. Experienced in high-availability systems, performance optimization, capacity planning, and troubleshooting complex distributed systems.

Strong technical leader with experience mentoring engineers, leading cross-functional teams (including leading a 6-person system test team), and driving technical initiatives. Extensive background in business process automation, workflow design, and large-scale test automation. Experienced in CI/CD pipeline setup (Jenkins, GitLab, Git/Gerrit) and enabling smooth deployment workflows with green/blue and canary strategies. Agile/Scrum practitioner with hands-on experience in iterative development and continuous improvement.

Passionate about automation, AI/ML technologies, and process efficiency. Implemented AI-powered search solutions using natural language processing and fuzzy matching. Keen interest in emerging technologies including Generative AI, LLM integration, and agentic systems. Firm believer in keeping things simple (Unix/Linux philosophy) and maintaining high quality in all work. Strong advocate for best practices in infrastructure as code, observability, and DevOps culture.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | Code-to-Cloud Platform Team

Participated in go-to person rotation and on-call activities, providing 24/7 support for critical infrastructure and ensuring high availability
experience.technologies: TypeScript, JavaScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Code Pipeline, Jenkins, Terraform, System Design, Process Automation

projects.title: Klarna Code-to-Cloud Platform - Process Automation
description: Contributed to Klarna Engineering Platform's Code-to-Cloud (C2C) team, managing the centralized cloud deployment platform for most of Klarna's services. Designed and implemented automated workflows and system integrations for service lifecycle management.

Developed automated features for AWS infrastructure management using Terraform, improving platform stability and efficiency. Designed data flows between deployment systems, monitoring systems, and service registries.

Led migration of Jenkins jobs to AWS Code Pipeline, modernizing CI/CD workflows and deployment automation. Designed and implemented upgrade and deployment workflows (green/blue and canary promotion strategies) with sophisticated process automation.
